name: ZTE nubia Z80 Ultra
highlights:
Released 2025, October 22
227g, 8.6mm thickness
Android 16, Nebula AIOS 2
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum frame, glass back
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.7, 35mm (standard), 1/1.3", 1.2µm, PDAF, OIS
64 MP, f/2.4, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.7µm, multi-directional PDAF (15cm - ∞), OIS, 2.7x optical zoom (vs. 26mm cam)
50 MP, f/1.8, 18mm (ultrawide), 1/1.55", PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Ring-LED, dual-tone flash, panorama, DSG HDR

COMMS.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

MISC.Colors: Black, Silver, Starry Night Blue, Luo Tian Yi Red
